item.title: Logseq
item.description: Logseq is the first note-taking app that worked for my chaotic mind. I have tried Obsidian, however the longer form pages v/s blocks as the primary unit of knowledge keeps me firmly with Logseq.

item.title: Oct 8th, 2022
item.description: This is a test. A tiny test. What if I published a Logseq graph as my personal website? A digital garden! Let’s see what makes more sense - a Hugo theme or the whole Logseq web-app. The Hugo theme is very appealing because it is not bandwidth hungry. And it works without JavaScript! Okay, with the exception of one concern - I’m not sure I like the latest-notes approach, can be quite confusing for a new visitor.
